Package no.ntnu.iir.bluej.extensions.linting.core.ui

Class AuditWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.stage.Window
      • javafx.stage.Stage
        • no.ntnu.iir.bluej.extensions.linting.core.ui.AuditWindow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget, ViolationListener
    public class AuditWindow
extends javafx.stage.Stage
implements ViolationListener
    Represents a GUI Window responsible for displaying linter violations. This is the main window for the Linter extensions. Listens to the ViolationListener, and updates the GUI when violations change.

    • Method Detail

      • onViolationsChanged

        public void onViolationsChanged​(HashMap<String,​List<Violation>> violationsMap)
        Update the Violations pane to reflect the new truth of violations. Adds a new TitledPane for each entry, containing a ListView of Violations.
        Specified by:
        onViolationsChanged in interface ViolationListener
        Parameters:
        violationsMap - the updated source of truth for violations
